front.title: •Luke's Lightsaber
front.gametext: Deploy on Luke. Adds 1 to defense value and training destiny. May add 1 to Force drain where present. May target a character, creature, speeder bike, or swoop for free. Draw 2 destiny. Target hit, and its forfeit = 0 if total destiny > defense value.
front.lore: Weapon of a truly powerful warrior. Constructed by Luke as part of his training.
